punktiert.GPUPhysics
Interface BehaviorInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
BAttraction, BConstantForce, BVortex, BWander, BWorldBox
public interface BehaviorInterface

abstract interface for implementing particle behaviors

implement this interface for any new behavior

by Karsten Schmidt: toxi.physics.behaviors.ParticleBehavior

Method Summary
 void apply(Particle p)
          Applies the behavior to the passed in particle.
 

Method Detail

apply

void apply(Particle p)
Applies the behavior to the passed in particle. The method is assumed to manipulate the given instance directly.

Parameters:
p - particle
